Abstrak: Parcel courier industry has been growing rapidly, parallel with the growth of e-commerce users. This rosy opportunity has created tougher competition among parcel courier service players. PT Pos Indonesia, a state-owned company, has been long known as the pioneer of parcel courier service, and struggling to survive from lowering market share over time. The analysis of internal and external condition is done to know the current strategic position of the company in the e-commerce era. General analysis that consists of political/legal, economic, socio-cultural, demographic, global, and technological give insights about environmental trends that influence industry condition. ConsumersÃ‚Â’ bargaining power, SuppliersÃ‚Â’ bargaining power, threats of new entrants, threats of substitute products, and intensity of rivalry are factors to examine based on PorterÃ‚Â’s five forces model. JNE and J&T, as the current tough competitors are examined to understand the different strategies implied. Completing the external environment, internal environment is studied, to find the resources and capabilities contributing to competitive advantage. The competitive advantage that fulfill valuable, costly to imitate, non-substitutable and rare criteria is categorized as sustainable competitive advantage and act as the internal strengths that supposedly supports to exploit the opportunities and mitigate the threats. The internal issues which may contribute to lessen competitiveness is also identified, to minimize the weaknesses that can influence the companyÃ‚Â’s strategic position. After evaluating the internal and external situations, SWOT is generated as the basis for three level strategic planning: corporate, business, and functional area. Doing market penetration and product development, and restructuring product portfolio which has no connection with core business, Pos Properti, and related diversification with less efficiency, Pos Logistik, are the suggested corporate level strategy. Following the strategy, business level strategy leads Pos Indonesia to be a cost leader, but many improvements are discovered to maintain the quality in functional area, including operations, marketing, human resources, and finance.
Kata Kunci: Internal and external environment, SWOT analysis, corporate level strategy, business level strategy, functional strategy, cost leadership, market penetration, product development, restructuration.
